text:
For building the docs, I propose to have "make html" create symbolic links to examples/nilearn_cache from all the example subfolders nilearn_cache directory (on unix systems only, of course). The goal being to federate the cache across all examples, in order to minimize computation.

This would be useful for CircleCI, but I suspect for all developers also.

What do people think?
title: Proposal: symbolic links to a common nilearn_cache dir
clean_text: for build doc I propos make html creat symbol link examplesnilearncach exampl subfold nilearncach directori unix system cours the goal feder cach across exampl order minim comput thi would use circleci I suspect develop also what peopl think

title: Proposal: symbolic links to a common nilearn_cache dir
